snippet.title: MLB The Show 18 - First Look Gameplay Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/mlb-the-show-18-ps4/

Learn more here:  theshow.com
http://theshownation.com/
https://www.facebook.com/mlbtheshow/
https://twitter.com/sonysandiego
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/mlb-the-show-18-ps4/

Home runs, steals, and epic catches – get deep into the action and experience your favorite parts of baseball with MLB® The Show™ 18. With the most exciting and personal baseball gaming experience on console, The Show™ 18 delivers condensed, but authentic games in classic and current stadiums that may feel so real, you can smell the grass. 

Experience the best of baseball in MLB® The Show™ 18.

Available March 27, 2018

Major League Baseball and Minor League Baseball trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball Properties, Inc. and MLB Advanced Media, L.P., as applicable. All rights reserved. Visit MLB.com, the Official Site of Major League Baseball and MiLB.com, the Official Site of Minor League Baseball.
